name: Neural-Parasite Apex Stalker
description: A biological nightmare that feasts on the consciousness of its prey. It screams in the voices of its victims to lure others into the dark.

abilities.name: Psychic Scream
abilities.description: Stuns all nearby enemies with a blast of pure terror.

abilities.name: Shadow Phase
abilities.description: Becomes intangible and moves through walls for a short duration.

lore: Xenobiologists believe this creature didn't evolve naturally, but was bio-engineered as a weapon of psychological warfare by a precursor civilization.
